channel.title: TEAM #MSPkers!
channel.description:
[center][b][size=24pt]TEAM #MSPkers![/size][/b][/center] [center][size=14pt]NEXT EVENT:[/size][/center] [center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zqWAj.png[/img] [quote="Wet Dreamss"]Skype: Yes Will a script be provided?: Yes, via skype How many ways will the loot be split: It depends on the people that actually take part in the event. How do I know you won't back stab me and lure me: We've only just started doing PK events so there is no certain way you can positively trust us. However, in our PK trip today (29/3/2012) people were risking claws in the clan and we didn't back stab.
Enjoy![/quote][/center] [u]WARNING:[/u] PLEASE NOTE THAT PUTTING YOUR NAME ON THIS TOPIC MAY RESULT IN A BAN ON RUNESCAPE. SO, IF YOU ARE WILLING TO JOIN, PLEASE SEND IT TO ME IN A PM! :)
[u]INTRODUCTION:[/u] I, Seif, decided to make a team where we would go PK or rush people. We would be basically rushing people over the CB 98 at places in the Wilderness such as Revenants, Chaos Ele, etc. Here is some info about us:
[ul][li]Main World: W87+89[/li] [li]Friend Chat: MSPkers[/li] [li]Leader's RSN: Lugworm2 [ME][/li] [li]Leader's Skype [For Voice Chat]: seifpkz[/li][/ul]
[u]Chat Ranks:[/u]
[ul][li][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20070811234713/runescape/images/9/91/Recruit_icon.gif[/img]Recruit[/li] [li][img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20070811234832/runescape/images/c/c7/Corporal_icon.gif[/img]Corporal[/li] [li][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100111082906/runescape/images/b/b9/Sergeant_icon.gif[/img]Sergeant[/li] [li] [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20070806142654/runescape/images/9/96/Lieutenant_icon.gif[/img]Lieutenant[/li] [li] [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111118220022/runescape/images/f/f7/Captain_icon.png[/img]Captain[/li] [li][img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100403203505/runescape/images/1/11/General_icon.gif[/img]General[/li][/ul]
[u]ROSTER:[/u]
[ul][li][img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100403203505/runescape/images/1/11/General_icon.gif[/img]B2300 T4nk[Leader][/li] [li][img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100403203505/runescape/images/1/11/General_icon.gif[/img]Wet Dreamss[Co-Leader][/li] [li][img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111118220022/runescape/images/f/f7/Captain_icon.png[/img]Jc22493[/li] [li][img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20070806142654/runescape/images/9/96/Lieutenant_icon.gif[/img]Rip4d[/li] [li][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100111082906/runescape/images/b/b9/Sergeant_icon.gif[/img]drubrkletern[/li] [li][img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111118220022/runescape/images/f/f7/Captain_icon.png[/img]Mihalich[/li] [li][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20070811234713/runescape/images/9/91/Recruit_icon.gif[/img]Skyro[/li] [li][img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111118220022/runescape/images/f/f7/Captain_icon.png[/img]Krackkid[/li] [li][img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20070806142654/runescape/images/9/96/Lieutenant_icon.gif[/img]Stupit[/li] [li][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20070811234713/runescape/images/9/91/Recruit_icon.gif[/img]Pink Phat[/li] [li][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20070811234713/runescape/images/9/91/Recruit_icon.gif[/img](N)eon[/li][/ul]
[u]APPLICATION:[/u] [code=Application]Name: RS Name: Age: Location: Combat Level: What Can you PK in? [MELEE/RANGE/MAGE]:[/code]

item.title: TEAM #MSPkers!
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote="(N)eon, post:102, topic:437457"][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=540165.msg3963299#msg3963299 date=1333483054]

I’m introducing a new event to this clan.

Only clan members can participate in this particular “give away”

This give away will be based off of a lottery system.

How does this work?

Lottery tickets cost 500k (RSGP, only available to clan members), I will write your name down on a small piece of paper every ticket purchased. Then on this Friday I will put all of those pieces of paper in a hat and will draw the winner over tinychat (with camera). The winner will receive ALL of the money from the lottery.

You can register for the clan and enter the lottery at any time.

The next giveaway will be a membership card.

So your saying I pay 500k, if I win I get all the money and membership card?

No, you would just win the money, the next giveaway is a membership card.

Oh i see, i wont join this one… ill save the GP for Membership card.

The Membership card won’t require a GP input, that will just be in a giveaway.
[/quote]

Okay, then i might need to enter this one lmfao[/quote]

Edit: RSN for the give away: Revenense, you can also join the Friends chat “MSPkers” and I’ll usually be in there

Read full topic

What Can you PK in? [MELEE/RANGE/MAGE]: All once i get my stats higher working on maxing or almost maxing out my pure[/quote]Atyour CB level, it’s going to be hard for you to be with us. So sorry. If you can get a higher level like 98+, I’ll accept you.

item.title: TEAM #MSPkers!
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

rip4d:

Oh yeah, guys, for anything thinking of ranging, get swift gloves. They are ridiculously useful. They can fire extra shots with nearly anything, they can stun an opponent for 10 seconds, and give a hefty range bonus of +15. They are absolutely free once you have them unlocked, and look sexy as fuck <3 If you can get them, use them. You may find it a lot better than melee or even magic.

We do need some rangers so they won’t be able to pray anything.

Read full topic

item.title: TEAM #MSPkers!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:81, topic:437457”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=540165.msg3959264#msg3959264 date=1333118980]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=540165.msg3959223#msg3959223 date=1333111397]Well done, you just completely violated what I said in my PM. I did not say you were allowed to lure, I said to keep it COMPLETELY OFF OF MOPARSCAPE

I don’t see why it isn’t allowed… It doesn’t break any of our rules or Jagex’s
[/quote]Because I told him to completely keep Moparscape out of anything related to the clan. I didn’t say he couldn’t do what he wants in his clan, I told him to keep Moparscape out of it. Saying ‘Davidi2 said we can lure’ is the complete opposite of what I asked him to do. And like EPE said, it’s scamming. Not ‘basically’ scamming, it’s scamming. And I don’t condone that at all.
[/quote]

I understand that part, but if Jagex considered it scamming they would take action against it… Instead they give you the tools to know something isn’t right, and if you fall for it its your own fault[/quote]Jagex does consider it scamming, which is why they do take action against it… removing potential scamming methods, making posts about avoiding scams, etc. Obviously they can’t return items and things like that because it’d be hard to tell people faking it from people that actually got scammed. But that logic is bad anyways, in the real world it’s called fraud.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:81, topic:437457”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=540165.msg3959264#msg3959264 date=1333118980]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=540165.msg3959223#msg3959223 date=1333111397]Well done, you just completely violated what I said in my PM. I did not say you were allowed to lure, I said to keep it COMPLETELY OFF OF MOPARSCAPE

I don’t see why it isn’t allowed… It doesn’t break any of our rules or Jagex’s
[/quote]Because I told him to completely keep Moparscape out of anything related to the clan. I didn’t say he couldn’t do what he wants in his clan, I told him to keep Moparscape out of it. Saying ‘Davidi2 said we can lure’ is the complete opposite of what I asked him to do. And like EPE said, it’s scamming. Not ‘basically’ scamming, it’s scamming. And I don’t condone that at all.
[/quote]

I understand that part, but if Jagex considered it scamming they would take action against it… Instead they give you the tools to know something isn’t right, and if you fall for it its your own fault[/quote]
As well as they mute the people who say “doubling money” whereas no action is taken against those who lure. It’s just an unfair advantage to the game.

Read full topic
